author: westboy, daliyoucefmedakram@gmail.com, @bouh
description:
Animate text to simulate it being written one character at at time (also called "typewriter" effect), with a customizable time between each character. Useful for dialogue scenes or visual novels.

Add the behavior to a Text object (BBText, Bitmap Text object) and choose the interval between characters.

* When the text changes, the automatic typing starts again from the beginning with the new text.
* You can change the speed of the text typing by changing the interval with events.
* Use a condition to check if the typing finished.
* You can also pause the typing and resume it after.
fullName: Auto typing animation for text ("typewriter" effect)
name: AutoTyping
shortDescription: Animate text to simulate it being written one character at at time (also called "typewriter" effect).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Animate text to simulate it being written one character at at time (also called "typewriter" effect), with a customizable time between each character.  Add the behavior to the object, and it will get animated when the text is changed. You can also pause/resume it.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Text_AutoTyping

eventsFunctions.description: Execute actions when the auto typing text ends.
eventsFunctions.name: TypingFinished

eventsFunctions.description: Detect if the auto typing is on pause.
eventsFunctions.name: TypingPause

eventsFunctions.description: Change the time between characters being typed.
eventsFunctions.name: ChangeInterval
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the interval between characters of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_
